description: 1 x  London Plane (applicants ref. T4) - Crown raise by 1m, only above one car parking space at the end. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Lime (applicants ref. T5) - Remove epicormics at base. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Lime (applicants ref. T6) - Crown raise over access road and car parking by 1m. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Magnolia (applicants ref. T11) - Clear dead debris from base. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Weeping Willow (applicants ref. T13) - Crown lift from roof by 1m. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x London Plane (applicants ref. G4) - Remove very small diameter branch from over car parking area. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.3 x London Plane (applicants ref. G4) - Remove deadwood only over car parking. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order.1 x Cherry (applicants ref. G6) - Remove. Standing in Area A1 of Tree Preservation Order. (amended)
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
